overview: In the early months of 1941, Italy's offensive had stalled and a Greek counter-offensive pushed into Albania. Germany sought to aid Italy by deploying troops to Romania and Bulgaria and attacking Greece from the east. Meanwhile, the British landed troops and aircraft to shore up Greek defences. A coup d'Ã©tat in Yugoslavia on 27 March caused Adolf Hitler to order the conquest of that country.
title: Field of Operations: Balkans
